column1: It was on the morning of the second day that the first link was forged in what was destined to form a chain of circumstances ending in a life for one then unborn such as has never been paralleled in the history of man.Two sailors were washing down the decks of the Fuwalda

column3: and the captain had stopped to speak with John Clayton and Lady Alice.The men were working backwards toward the little party who were facing away from the sailors. Closer and closer they came
column4: until one of them was directly behind the captain. In another moment he would have passed by and this strange narrative would never have been recorded.But just that instant the officer turned to leave Lord and Lady Greystoke
